_header: O man unkind print in thy mind
_description: James Ryman, an appeal to Man to love Christ — five stanzas rhyme royal

CULEe112.First Lines:
O man vnkyende pryente in þi myendeThe perfecte loue of criste
                    aboue…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…The whiche graunt vs by his grete graceIn blisse to se hym
                    face to face
CULEe112.Editions:
Zupitza,  Julius,
                        ed.  
             “Die Gedichte des Franziskaners Jacob Ryman.” 
             Archiv für das Studium der neueren Sprachen und
                Literaturen
         89 (1892): 167-338: 262.
